content:
You're welcome! I'm thrilled to have been able to help. It's great to hear that you've had amazing camping experiences recently, and I'm sure this trip will be just as fantastic. With some planning and preparation, you'll be all set for an epic adventure along the Pacific Coast Highway.

Remember to take your time, enjoy the scenic views, and soak up the natural beauty of the coast. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further recommendations.

Most importantly, have a blast with your friends, and create some unforgettable memories along the way!

Safe travels, and happy camping!
